processingCommand.script:
:SET &TZ# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,TIME_ZONE,1)
:SET &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &RESTART_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,RESTART_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, CHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CHECK_COUNT_AFTER_RESTART# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, CHECK_COUNT_AFTER_RESTART,1)

:PUB &TZ#
:PUB &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &RESTART_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &CHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &CHECK_COUNT_AFTER_RESTART#

:SET &RUN_ID#      = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
:SET &RUN_ID#      = FORMAT(&RUN_ID#)
!:SET &RUN_ID#      = &TRIGGERID#
!:PUBLISH &RUN_ID#,,WORKFLOW

! INC/CTASK
:SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""

:IF &TICKET# = "null"
:  SET &TICKET# = ""
:  PUBLISH &TICKET#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &TICKET# <> ""
:  SET &INC# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,3)
:  SET &CTA# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,5)
:  IF &INC# = "INC"
:    SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "INC"
:  ELSE
:    IF &CTA# = "CTASK"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "CTASK"
:    ELSE
:      PRINT "WARNING - No valid INC/CTASK!"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TICKET_TYPE#

! Get current time and date
:SET &TIME_NOW#  = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS","&TZ#")
:SET &DATE_NOW#  = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL("YYYY-MM-DD","&TZ#")
:PUBLISH &TIME_NOW#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DATE_NOW#,,WORKFLOW

! Mbuild message
:IF &RESTART_TYPE# = "Without Mbuild"
:  SET &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE# = "without mbuild"
:  SET &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER# = "nombuild nodelay"
:ELSE
:  SET &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE# = "with mbuild"
:  SET &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER# = ""
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER#,,WORKFLOW

:IF &MODULES# = ""
:  PRINT "ERROR - No modules selected!"
:  SET &STATUS# = CANCEL_UC_OBJECT(&RUN_ID#, "ENDED_CANCEL")
:ENDIF

:DEFINE &AMODULES#, string, 20
:FILL &AMODULES#[] = STR_SPLIT("&MODULES#", ",")
:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&AMODULES#[])

:SET &WMS_RESTART#       = "false"
:SET &REFS_RESTART#      = "false"
:SET &RW_RESTART#        = "false"
:SET &EMS_RESTART#       = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_RESTART#  = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_RESTART# = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_RESTART#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_RESTART#  = "false"

:SET &REST_MODULES#      = ""

:SET &RUNVAR# = 1
:WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN#
:  SWITCH "Y"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "WMS"
:      SET &WMS_RESTART# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*WMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "WMS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "REFS"
:      SET &REFS_RESTART# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*REFS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "REFS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "RW"
:      SET &RW_RESTART# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*RW*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "RW,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "EMS"
:      SET &EMS_RESTART# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*EMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "EMS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "WMS-FAIL"
:      SET &WMS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*WMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "WMS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "REFS-FAIL"
:      SET &REFS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*REFS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "REFS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "RW-FAIL"
:      SET &RW_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*RW*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "RW,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "EMS-FAIL"
:      SET &EMS_FAIL_RESTART# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*EMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "EMS,")
:      ENDIF
:  ENDSWITCH
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&REST_MODULES#)
:SET &LE# = &LENGTH# - 1
:SET &REST_MODULES# = SUBSTR(&REST_MODULES#, 1, &LE#)
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &WMS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW

! Login
:SET &MODULE_LOGIN# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.RESTART.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "LOGIN", 1)
:PUBLISH &MODULE_LOGIN#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS# = ""
:PUBLISH &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW

! RPTAB
:SET &CHECK_RPTAB# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.RESTART.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CHECK_RPTAB", 1)
:PUBLISH &CHECK_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW

! Event Assignment Group
:SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.RESTART.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP_PROD", 1)
:SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.RESTART.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE", 1)
:SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "True"

! STRY0029851 - configuration item is not defined value then it is nonproduction and will be assigned LATAM L2
:IF &CONFIGURATION_ITEM# <> GET_VAR(CONFIG.RESTART.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "TEST_NOT_CONFIGURATION_ITEM", 1)
:  SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.RESTART.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP", 1)
:  SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = ""
:  SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "False"
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &LEN#
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV#,,WORKFLOW

! Incident Site Update
:SET &INC_SITE_UPDATE# = "false"
:PUBLISH &INC_SITE_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
